## Carga de Imagen

```{r eruptions, echo=FALSE}
library(shiny)
library(miniUI)
library(magick)
library(keras)
library(DT)
library(text2vec)
library(shinyFiles)

vgg16 <- application_vgg16(weights = 'imagenet', include_top = TRUE)


shinyApp(
ui <- fluidPage(
  sidebarLayout(
    sidebarPanel(
      fileInput("file1", "Elegir Imagen",
        accept = c(
          "imagen/csv",
          "imagen/cosiyas",
          ".jpg")
        ),
      tags$hr(),
      checkboxInput("header", "Header", TRUE)
    ),
    mainPanel(
      tags$em("Preview"),
      imageOutput("imagen"),
      tags$em("Esto es un..."),
      tableOutput("contents")
    )
  )
),
server <- function(input, output, session) {
  output$imagen <- renderImage({
    inFile = input$file1
    print(inFile)
    if (!is.null(inFile))
    {
      
      width  <- session$clientData$output_imagen_width
      height <- session$clientData$output_imagen_height
      list(
        src = inFile$datapath,
        width=width,
        height=height
      )
    }
    else
    {
      list(src="www/kast.png")
    }
  },
  deleteFile = FALSE
  )
  
  
  output$contents <- renderTable({
    # input$file1 will be NULL initially. After the user selects
    # and uploads a file, it will be a data frame with 'name',
    # 'size', 'type', and 'datapath' columns. The 'datapath'
    # column will contain the local filenames where the data can
    # be found.
    inFile <- input$file1

    if (is.null(inFile))
      return(NULL)
    # Procesar
    img     <- image_load(inFile$datapath, target_size = c(224,224))
    x = image_to_array(img)
    dim(x) <- c(1, dim(x))
    x = imagenet_preprocess_input(x)
    features = vgg16 %>% predict(x)
    imagenet_decode_predictions(features, top = 3)[[1]]
  })
}
)

```
